mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_pos SET isPrimary=0 WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT up.userPosId,up.posId,up.userId,up.isPrimary, u.fullname,p.posName FROM SYS_USER_POS up,SYS_USER u,SYS_POSITION p WHERE up.userid=u.userid AND up.posid=p.posid AND userPosId=#{userPosId}
select from SYS_USER_POS where userId=#{userId} and posId=#{posId}
select distinct userId from SYS_USER_POS where posId=#{posId}
select distinct a.userId,b.fullname from SYS_USER_POS a,sys_user B where A.userId=B.userId and posId in (${posIds})
SELECT a.userPosId,a.posId,a.userId,a.isPrimary, b.posName FROM SYS_USER_POS a,SYS_POSITION b where a.posid=b.posid and a.userId=#{userId} and a.isPrimary=1

SELECT up.userPosId,up.posId,up.userId,up.isPrimary, u.fullname,u.account,p.posName FROM SYS_USER_POS up,SYS_USER u,SYS_POSITION p where up.userId=u.userId AND up.posid=p.posid AND up.posId =#{posId} order by userPosId desc
